title: Indian vegetable biryani
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee (clarified butter), or olive oil', '1 red onion, cut into 1cm dices', '1/2 teaspoon cumin seed', '1 (2.5cm) piece cinnamon stick', '7 peppercorns', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '1 tomato, diced', '120ml water', '75g peas', '65g diced carrot', '80g diced potato', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon red chilli pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '950ml water', '370g basmati rice, rinsed and drained']
